price: Na kila nafsi itakuja na pamoja nayo mchungaji na shahidi.
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٞ وَشَهِيدٞ
footnotes: Na kila nafsi njema na mbaya, itakuja na pamoja nayo wa kuichunga kuipeleka kwenye mkusanyo, na wenye kuwatolea ushahidi wa vitendo vyao

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wajāat kullu nafsin maʿahā sāiqun washahīdun
